name: features_core_infra_database
bodyContent: Basha Ai understands the kind of data management your app needs and sets up the infrastructure behind the scenes.
disclaimer: This content is for informational purposes only and may include opinions. It should not be taken as professional advice.

name: features_core_infra_storage
bodyContent: If your app needs to handle files, Cloud Basha Ai makes it easy. Users can seamlessly upload and retrieve files like images and documents, with all the storage handled for you.

name: features_core_infra_email
bodyContent: Built-in email capabilities let your app send notifications, onboarding sequences, or marketing updates directly—without extra setup.

name: features_core_infra_payment
bodyContent: Add checkout flows or subscription plans in seconds. Basha AI integrates with Stripe for secure, one-click payment processing.

name: features_core_infra_auto-generate
bodyContent: Basha Ai automatically creates secure connections (APIs) for every part of your app's data and functionality, enabling your app to communicate effortlessly with other services.

name: features_ai_powered_embeddings
bodyContent: Convert text, images, and data into intelligent representations that power search, recommendations, and AI understanding.

name: features_ai_powered_rag
bodyContent: Generate accurate, context-aware responses by combining your data with large language models.

name: features_ai_powered_vector
bodyContent: Store and search high-dimensional data instantly for fast, relevant, and semantic results.

name: features_ai_powered_curated_data
bodyContent: Use pre-structured, domain-ready datasets optimized for AI-driven insights and responses.

name: feature_request_cloud_basha
headerContent: Im fuming spent so much time on my app and after restarting 3 or 4 times I got and AI that could create a dam checklist i wanted.
bodyContent: was almost done and just had to tweak one thing and the whole app got deleted.    Everything gone.    The AI got some Crap CRM created nothing what I had and not almost used up half of my credits to try restoring what I had and nothing.

name: feature_request_cloud_basha
headerContent: No-Reply needs to follow the owners domain not Base44
bodyContent: The no-reply@notifications.base44.com is a bit ridiculous. why is there no way to use my domain. no series business would allow some other businesses name to show up there. Is there no work around?

name: feature_request_cloud_basha
headerContent: Video player and hosting missing - use Lovable for now
bodyContent: I have used base 44 to build apps and very satisfied, however no support for native videos has made me switch to Lovable.

name: about_us
bodyContent: At CloudBasha AI, we believe that anyone with an idea should be able to build an app without needing deep technical knowledge.

name: about_us
bodyContent: Our Mission
bodyList: Our mission is simple: turn ideas into fully functional apps using the power of AI.

name: about_us
bodyList:
We created Cloud Basha AI to remove the complexity of traditional development. No long timelines, no complicated tools, no technical barriers. Just a single prompt and your app begins to take shape with clean, editable code you can refine and deploy instantly.

Our platform blends intelligent conversation with advanced code generation to give you a seamless building experience. Whether you're a business owner, startup founder, enterprise team, or independent creator, Cloud Basha AI helps you accelerate development and bring ideas to life faster than ever.

Every day, innovators, companies, and creators trust Cloud Basha AI to build internal tools, automate workflows, launch new products, and explore fresh concepts. We’re proud to support clients across industries as they transform their ideas into real, usable applications.

At Cloud Basha AI, we’re not just generating code, we're empowering a new way of creating.

A future where building software is simple, fast, and accessible to everyone.

Let’s build the future, one idea at a time!
